name: Super Cultist 64
description:
Super Mario 64

Controls:

- W, A, S, D for movement

- Spacebar to jump

- Shift to run

- CTRL to stomp while airborne

Features:

- Jump right when you touch the ground to jump higher

- Walk near scyhtefires to set your checkpoint

- Avoid zumbas

Description:

You're a cultist who gets teleported to hell all of a sudden and has to find necessary equipment for cute demons so they can do cute stuff

Credits:
programming - kamos_dev (@uh#0893)

modelling & textures - saffukun (@safkan#3002)

sounds - opensource

Made for LTUJam 2023
